name: Salamander
description: The MSX port of Salamander (沙羅曼蛇, Saramanda) is significantly different from the original and any other ports. New to this port is a graphical introduction that introduces human pilots for each ship, as well as names for each stage. The levels are notably longer than the arcade original, and the player is forced to start from a pre-defined checkpoint upon death of either pilot, instead of starting where he left off. After level two, the player can choose the order of the next three stages. In addition, the player can collect "E" capsules by destroying certain enemies. Collecting fifteen will permanently upgrade one of the available weapons on the power-up bar. Some weapons allow the player ships to merge, one player controlling movements and the second player controlling weapons. Instead of the Vic Viper and the Lord British Space Destroyer, the ships are known as the Sabel Tiger and the Thrasher; piloted by human characters named Iggy Rock and Zowie Scott. The story takes place in the year 6709 A.D and has 2 different endings. The MSX version was re-released for the Wii's Virtual Console in Japan on January 12, 2010. It was later released for the Wii U's Virtual Console on July 20, 2016. They were also made available for the Project EGG on Windows Store on May 19, 2015.

name: Restless Soul
description: Restless Soul is a hauntingly humorous adventure game about a soul trying to return to the land of the living. Take part in bullet-hell battles, unlock secrets, make friends with quirky spirits and more!

name: NinNinDays2
description: A life turned upside down after an encounter with two female ninja?! NinNinDays2 is a romance adventure game is set in Akihabara, where you'll enjoy your new, slightly naughty roommate life with laughter, tears, and the friendship of two female ninja.

name: Make a Good Mega Man Level Contest
description:
The good news: A festival is being held in honor of Mega Man and his tireless heroics! The bad news: Dr. Wily shows up to ruin the fun, and basically everything at the festival tries to kill our hero. Mega Man must conquer an array of eclectic challenges in order to restore peace!

Inspired by the Super Mario-themed Make a Good Level contests, this is the game that launched the largest and most ambitious Mega Man fangame series ever. In contrast with later installments, MaGMML1 is built in Blyka's Engine, contains a small number of contestant-submitted levels, gives the player a limited number of lives, and has relatively few extras and special features. The judging rubric, copied from Make a Good Level Contest X2, is borderline incomprehensible. The special weapons, decided by popular vote, are somewhat redundant due to how the voting was set up. Arguably the biggest distinguishing feature, however, is that the game is absolutely full of bugs.

Regardless of the quirks, the game still built the foundation for the bigger and more polished games that followed it. Five people judge levels based on certain criteria, levels are placed into tiers, Wily levels are made by the judges, and everything is compiled into a big game in the end. On top of that, the game is full of humor (intentional and otherwise), and there are several memorable (and infamous) levels that any fan of the series should experience at least once. History must be preserved! Play at your own risk - there are loads of glitches and the whole game is full of jank.

name: Make a Good Mega Man Level Contest 2
description:
The good news: Mega Man's heroics are once again being celebrated with a festival, this one even bigger than the last! The bad news: Actually...things look pretty safe this time, and it's highly unlikely that Dr. Wily will try to destroy reality as we know it with a gigantic space cannon, so there's probably no bad news at all. Just enjoy all the creative, wacky, unique, and unusual simulations the festival has to offer, and say hello to that mysterious figure who seems to be watching you...

MaGMML2 expands and improves on MaGMML1 in almost every way. Built in Mega Engine and subjected to more extensive playtesting, the game runs smoothly (you can actually ride Rush Jet this time!) and offers several new configuration options. The judging rubric has been refined, and judge comments cover the highs and lows of each level in greater depth. A new collectible and many more assets were available to the level designers, allowing for even more variety in the gameplay. Several features have been added to keep things fresh, and there's enough bonus content to keep you entertained long after you've completed the contestant-submitted levels.

name: Lab Bio-Terror
description: Lab Bio-Terror - In this shoot em all game, you are a special agent who was sent to clean up a secret laboratory. Scientists screwed up, and it's up to you to eliminate the consequences of the leak of a dangerous virus!

name: MoveUp
description: Overwhelmed and want to escape the stresses of daily life, Move Up can help you unwind as you catch a well-deserved break. Power on your VR equipment and step into the game, where the simple task of stacking blocks can evoke the deepest and most satisfying feelings of accomplishment and relaxation.

name: Squarewood Farm
description: A relaxing and addictive farm-themed block puzzler. Harvest crops by forming rows, columns or squares with strangely shaped seeds. Use the profits from your vegetables to purchase tools, buy animals, or expand your humble farm.

name: Void Soul Awakening
description: Void Soul Awakening is a hack and slash inspired roguelite shooter. You will be thrown into the shoes....well....feet, of an immortal vessel as it fights it's way through an undead prison with the intent to escape.

name: Roads of Destiny
description: Play as a sorcerer. No swords, bows and arrows, knives or spears, just magic! Walk the path as a sorcerer, fight enemies, explore the world and stop a new circle of ancient prophecy.

name: Global Pandemic
description: Can you survive in a world with Zombies and Dinosaurs? Craft. Build. Survive. Create your own adventure!

name: Personal Trainer Simulator
description: A lighthearted, humorous and educational sim in which you take on the role of both nutritionist and health guru while overseeing and guiding your clients towards accomplishing their fitness goals.

name: SGS: Heia Safari
description: The only campaign where forces of Imperial Germany fought victoriously till the end. From 1914 to 1918 in East Africa, you play general Von Lettow and his skilled Askaris or Allied troops from the Empire, Belgium and Portugal. Get the ‘African Queen’ feel when playing this exotic campaign.

name: Engineer Alpha
description: Engineer Alpha is an open world survival and automation game. It combines an infinite editable world, building and connecting of automated machinery into complex assembly lines, with RPG style player progression.

name: Slobbish Dragon Princess 2
description: Takeru and Haru's life of slacc is upended once more as Iris, dragon queen of the Sea and Water factions shows up on Earth to claim the seas and bar all humans from entering them. Hijinks and plenty of dragon girls await in Slobbish Dragon Princess 2!

name: Snakepit Larry
description: Help explorer Larry on an adventure full of challenges and dangerous creatures. - 1 Player - A giant map to navigate - 4 different levels to explore - A 16-bit style adventure

name: Underwater World
description: Underwater World - is a colourful 2D platformer with dynamic and hardcore gameplay where you will have to do different levels playing as Plankton.

name: Medieval Fantasy Survival Simulator
description: You're gonna get yourself killed out here... There's monsters, bandits, and much, much worse roaming these lands... Do you really think you've got what it takes to survive? Or do you think you're cut out for much more than that... There's only one way to find out, and time is of the essence!

name: Evelyn's Adventure
description: Join Evelyn and the thief Moon Mask on a journey through a large open world full of dangers, secrets and treasures in this third person 3D fantasy adventure game to win the knight tournament, claim the hand of the princess and save your mother's life with her help.

name: Elisa Dragon Hunter
description: Elisa Dragon Hunter is an emotional action adventure in a dark fantasy setting. You play as a brave dragon hunter - Eliza. Your goal is to make your way through the cursed, evil-inhabited lands to find the last dragon and face him in an epic battle.

name: Huntress: The Cursed Village
description: Returning to her village from a hike, the Huntress finds it under a curse! Join the Huntress and battle exciting Match-3 challenges to overwhelm the curse and save the village.

name: Scratch Girl
description: Control the spaceship to find the beauty! Start a journey of conversation with the beauty!

name: PriOne
description: Prione is an open-world, Third-person survival game. It also contains elements of horror, adventure, and puzzle-solving that create a hardcore gaming experience. The game is difficult but not overkill; surviving isn’t supposed to be easy.

name: Secret Pie
description: Secret story between the mansion manager and three women

name: 100 Hidden Animalnaults: Felicat & Laika
description: Can you find the cat Felicat and the little dog Laika? They are in replica rockets and space stations!

name: Hyperball Tachyon
description: High-speed momentum platforming action! Dash up walls and shoot off ramps to get to the finish!

name: Robobeat
description: Keep your trigger finger on the pulse! In rhythm shooter Robobeat, it’s all about maximising your damage by shooting to the beat. Wall run, grapple hook, slide, and bunny hop your way through the haphazard mansion of a crazed robot-showman.

name: Slime Dice
description: Slime Dice is a Turn-Based Party RPG where you settle battles by playing Yatzi. Create all your own characters, both visually and stat wise, and set out to destroy the beasts of Spegroon!

name: Small Island
description: Small Island is an upcoming first-person exploration game where you have to escape the small mysterious Island you find yourself on. The game consists mainly in exploring the secret rooms and areas you'll find inside of it.

name: Complex Relations
description: Complex Relations is an erotic romance visual novel in three perspectives, exploring three unique protagonists' experience of love, sex, change and growth.

name: Cynoroid Forsaken
description: CYNOROID FORSAKEN is a free aim platformer that uses the mouse to aim and It is a free aim platformer where you aim with the mouse and move with the WASD keys. With multiple weapons, a laser chainsaw that can be used by right-clicking, and the ability to eat enemy carcasses.

name: 69 Iris Hot
description: 69 Iris Hot is a visual novel with puzzle elements, based on cyberpunk esthetic. Our heroine Iris is extremely attractive but hard to communicate with. She likes the excitement of solving the puzzles yet too unexpirienced in competing with others.

name: Sweet Desire 3
description: Hentai clicker with sexy anime girls. Undress hot beauties and satisfy them!

name: Horny Pixels
description: Horny pixels - In this mahjong connect game you can solve puzzles and admire beautiful animations of sex scenes that can teach you something new!

name: ASV Trident
description: You are the acting captain of the last war vessel of humanity. Now the ship is your home and refuge. "real-time roguelike spaceship sim"

name: Haunted House Escape
description: Enter, if you dare...Haunted House Escape - A VR Experience: A chilling mini escape adventure leading through an abandoned house. Highly realistic, immersive graphics and sounds. Be aware, you might not be the only one there.

name: Retro Kart Rush
description: Retro Kart Rush is a retro racing game that will transport you back to the 16-bit era. Where friendships were made (or broken) by playing multiplayer games in front of the TV.

name: Farlife
description: Farlife is a class-based action RPG set in space. Play as different alien species, each with their own unique abilities! Explore open worlds, Discover alien life, upgrade your arsenal, and fumble your way through the cosmos.

name: Crystal Goddess
description: Azura, the guardian goddess of the Emerald Grove is having a bad day. Her magical crystals have been stolen by the forces of evil! Help Azura get the crystals back and defeat the demon hordes!

name: Spellhearts
description: Play as a novice warlock in a fantastical magic town and receive quests from an array of sexy NPCs (and attempt to court them). If you enjoy dating sims, adventure games, adult content, parody/comedy, fantasy settings, and the occult, you will indeed have a good time with this unique casual game.

name: Snow-Swept Quest
description: A classic style turn-based RPG. Saya is stranded on an unfamiliar continent, surrounded by all manner of dangers. Will she make it home?

name: Monster X
description: New dangers have emerged. Mutated and powerful monsters are destroying our city. We must take action! Use a total of 4 weapons (Gun Sword / Gauntlets / Cannon / Bow) to fight with the enemy, flexibly use props, collect monster materials, modified weapons and defeat your enemy!

name: Upgrade VR
description: UPGRADE VR offers an effective brain training with simple and funny games developed by neuropsychologists. Сognitive training could be useful as a part of comprehensive recovery after COVID-19.

name: Modest Eyes
description: Modest Eyes is an addicting game in which you have to solve puzzles with Lovely Girls.The game is perfect for relaxing.

name: Touge Racers
description: Touge Racers is a single-play racing game. It is a race battle on the pass with the old car team that I met at the pass. A racing game where you can drift down a winding road.

name: Nargul: Humans are among us
description: Play in VR as a jovial but amnesiac alien. Explore the environment and interact freely with the people. Solve objectives, fight and cross the courses to find the ultimate truth.

name: Tartaria: The forgotten tale
description: Tartaria is an original fairy-tale adventure game based on Slavic culture and Slavic mythology. Taking place around 900 A.D., you play a young prince who starts off protecting his Slavic principality from robbers, dark forces, and evil mythical beings using brawn, and magic.

name: We Were Friends
description: A Battle Royal mode to finally know who is the best between you and your friends and a Prop Hunt mode (not implemented yet) to discover or rediscover the best of the caches.

name: Chess Crown
description: Chess Crown chess in a medieval fantasy theme and with the opportunity to compete with other players on the network.

name: Kuroi Tsubasa: Deluxe Edition
description: This DLC includes an ARTBOOK, HIGH QUALITY WALLPAPERS in 4k resolution and a special character viewer mode in the game!

name: Mech Arena
description: Mech Arena is an arcade shooter game taking place in an arena and dispatched on several rounds. Kill waves of enemies, upgrade your mech and exploit the ever changing ground of the arena to try to become one of its champions.

name: Sanity City
description: Start your new life in a futuristic cyber world. Team up with your friends and go on a raid. Acquire money, equipment and fame.

name: Fleet Commander: Pacific
description: Fleet Commander: Pacific is a grand strategic simulation of the naval war in the Pacific from 1941 to 1945. All major surface combat ships of the Japanese and Allied navies are present in this streamlined reproduction of the biggest maritime war ever.

name: Society
description: Post-apocalyptic shooter in the CIS setting

name: Evade the Taxman
description: A frightening singleplayer survival horror game where you have to find and collect a certain amount of bills spread randomly over several specific areas. Then once you have all the bills, you need to run to the exit.

name: Dear Monster
description: Allen thought he had his life all figured out. He just graduated university and was headed off to med school. Then a strange letter arrives from a grandfather he never new. He's pulled onto a new path toward a strange mansion filled with even stranger and alluring creatures.

name: Super Yodelland: Legend of the Katzenbär
description: A nice 2D-Jump-'n'-Run video game for everyone of all ages. Focused on exploring an alpine world full of mysteries.

name: Shinobi Non Grata
description: Shinobi alert! Use your 7 shinobi weapons to survive the bloodshed! Introducing a hard core 2D ninja action game by Hyper-retro graphics.

name: Zero Chastity: A Sultry Summer Holiday
description: Zero Chastity: A Sultry Summer Holiday brings you a summer of sex under the sun with four unique & sexy heroines with art from legendary hentai artist, Mizuryu Kei! This game is based off the popular eromanga series of the same title and is both fully-voiced and uncensored.

name: StarFlint the BlackHole Prophecy
description: Adventure game, puzzle platform and strategic space battles in a sci-fi universe. Many puzzles and riddles in a cartoon atmosphere in 2D and 3D.

name: MR 333
description: When the ritual begins it is feeding time. Find his substance or he will consume your body.

name: Spears of a Heart: Elusive Rhythms
description: Start a new life and explore the mysterious island. Meet the people and unleash their secrets while you enjoy tons of rhythm mini-games. Dig the musical dungeons, sing at the karaoke, or synchronize monsters to get crafting resources!

name: Kromaticube
description: KROMATICUBE is a minimalist arcade game where you have to avoid obstacles and listenning to chiptune musics. Just keep alive for at least 60 seconds to complete a level. Easy right ? Maybe not.

name: Vagabond
description: Explore procedurally generated living worlds in this 2D sandbox RPG. Meet hundreds of characters in cities, complete quests, craft powerful items, buy and furnish your home or fight monsters in dungeons.

name: Pregnant
description: In this first-person horror experience you will solve puzzles while navigating the pitch black Reed forest. Armed with only your flashlight you are at the mercy of the forests inhabitants, with limited time to find your way before they find you and end your adventure.

name: Bolt Action
description: A small, comedic zombie shooter that requires both twitch and strategic skills...One genetically enhanced man along with an inept, insulting, and cowardly scientist must save the World from the invading mutated hordes!

name: Scripture
description: The child king actually brought back the gods raised by the priests. He won the respect of the people, but there are those who have their eyes on the throne. Join this adventure as a god.

name: Tofu Escape
description: Tofu Escape is a platformer only for the most agile players.

name: Lemon Run
description: Hardest runner ever! Try and complete all 5 game modes that go from easy to impossible. (Legends have it that the creator of the game could only make it to 1500m in endless mode) Good luck!

name: Oscar's Paradise
description: Oscar's Paradise is a fast paced marble game where you must rush to the end while collecting Oscar's scraps.

name: Conquest of Empires
description: Establish Great Civilizations In the land of the seven continents, set up your military base and develop the internal and diplomatic affairs. Call up your heroes and troops, and learn how to take advantage of different kinds and formations of units to defeat the strong with the weak.

name: Murder of the Bear lake
description: In Murder of the Bear lake You go to explore the dark forest and the Bear lake you find some people and you talk with them and do some quest for them.

name: Action Sandbox
description: ACTION SANDBOX is a sandbox game that focuses on action. Creation can be created using the provided kinetic materials. Control the creation and complete the goal.

name: Who the Fuck Ate Grandma?
description: Time has come to celebrate Grandma's 93rd birthday. Everyone gathered for this memorable family dinner, unfortunately it seems that Grandma is going to be served for dessert ! Inspired by the 90s, discover a new retro point&click adventure game fully drawn in pixelart

name: Spooky Bricks
description: Break them bricks but beware of spooky creatures and critters!

name: Candy Maker
description: The player will have to lead a difficult life in the production of unusual substances, namely, funny sweets, their sale, laundering dirty money into clean ones. It will also be possible to purchase various goods. But remember, there is a mafia in the game

name: The Great Deer
description: The Great Deer is a modern point-n-click adventure game. You play as an intrepid explorer searching for an artefact of great value. Journey into an ancient temple, discover the secrets within, and uncover the truth behind a sinister ritual taking place within its walls.

name: Cinemoji: Series
description: Are you a series marathoner? This game is for you! Test your deduction skills and your knowledge trying to guess the name of the series represented by the emojis!

name: Only Mine
description: Only Mine is a shooter where a frenzied bride will shoot off thoughts and not only, the former girls of the groom. Defend your beloved by destroying all rivals on your way. Be careful about the rose and the gifts, landing can hurt you too. He will be just her!

name: Big Drug
description: BIG DRUG - A cooperative adventure game for 1-4 players. Find the criminal before he finds you. Run, search, laugh, but never deceive your brothers.

name: Chastity Catastrophe
description: Chastity Catastrophe is a action platformer where instead of beating up enemies, you break your friends out of chastity equipment!

name: The Roy Game
description: A game where puking zombies try to puke over your trashcans, you have to defend your trashcans by placing automatic puking robots. Meanwhile you have to attack the zombie-printing machines.

name: Amaze Adventure
description: Old school console RPG style. Collect cards for use in turn-based card battles. Explore the maze to find puzzle pieces that earn more cards. Discover various puzzle types in each world maze. Choose to help others or not. Play at your own pace. Simple controls. Multiple outcomes to each scenario.

name: Bear Adventures
description: Go through the levels collecting honey, set a time record, kill animals. In BEAR ADVENTURES you can play with friends, the co-op game mode supports up to 4 players!

name: Evolver
description: Evolver blends competitive fighting with quantum-cyberpunk-scifi to create a world of bizarre weapons, unconventional fighting styles, and a wildly eccentric cast.

name: Xross Dreams
description: Head-to-head arcade VS game, where all the characters are puzzle games, you control 2 at a time, and everybody does their own damage. A pre-, mid-, and post-apocalyptic fairy tale that teaches you telepathy if you decipher it properly. An climactic journey through stars and minds and trust.

name: Goodlands
description: A game about dinos digging up dinos: see if you have what it takes to be a junior paleontologist! Walk, hop, and drive your way around a badlands-inspired environment, meeting cute prehistoric townsfolk and discovering fossils for the Goodlands Natural History Museum.

name: Break Free
description: Break Free is a fast paced third person sci fi shooter game. The creatures that live among us have made the Earth uninhabitable for human life. You are mankind's best hope for survival. Make no mistake, war is coming and you shall die today, then you shall live to fight again tomorrow.

name: Snowstorm of despair
description: Snowstorm of despair is a cooperative survival-horror for up to 8 people. Try to survive in a storm and escape. But who knows what despair can make with people… Communicate and help or betray and deceive!

name: Space Station 51
description: You are a member of Space Station 51. When you wake up, you find that a zombie virus has broken out on the space station. You need to follow the command of the station master and take a series of actions.

name: Spell Sweeper
description: Spell Sweeper is a puzzle game which based on "Minesweeper". Fight against enemy by Opening/placing flags to squares.

name: Soccer Manager 2022
description: Sign official FIFPRO licensed players and compete to become the ultimate football manager!

name: Hot Hentai Puzzle Vol.2
description: Relaxing puzzle with beautiful women that will keep you in a good mood.

name: Space Salvage
description: Learn to navigate your space-pod through beautiful environments while collecting lost cargo. Skilfully manoeuvre your way through wreckage and asteroids while destroying mines and enemy factions. All while your eager yet amoral ship AI guides you. And remember: in space no-one can hear you clean

name: Prince Nikolai and the Vampires
description: In this SRPG, play as Prince Nikolai and gather an army of colorful, diverse heroes as he needs to save his kindgom from the threat of his archrival, the arrogant and ambitious vampire Zarius.

name: Surreal Deal
description: Join Al, a simple man with a not-so simple job on his two-week journey as a salesman from another dimension. Make choices, sales and friends!

name: OctoRaid VR
description: OctoRaid VR is a Cross-Platform-Based Asymmetric PvP VR Party Game in which you become an Octo or Hunter character and Fight against each other. If you access a VR device, you play Octo, a Giant Octopus Monster, and if you access Only PC or Mobile, you play Hunter, a Employee with a Diver concept.

name: Squid Run
description: An old child's game with new killing rules! Run while nobody sees, stay while you are being watched!

name: Devil Bartender
description: The Gentle Night Tavern of Monster Girl is a story-rich bartender simulation game. In this different world of medieval fantasy and magic atmosphere, you will play the role of the boss and bartender, and work hard for the bar business together with the unique monster girl waiters.

name: Chao's Collection of Random Games
description: A collection of games including a 2D and a 3D pinball platformer, a tower defense game, a generic turn-based RPG, an RTS game, a puzzle based platformer etc.

name: No Humanity 2: Swing'Em Up
description: No Humanity 2 is a rogue-lite bullet hell space adventure RPG, a smash'em up with a twist: you're equipped with a rope-like swingable umbilical cord that can grab, throw and retrieve bizarre weapons. As a space intern, your role includes serving coffees, printing paper, and saving the world.

name: Destructor Tanks
description: Outplay your rivals by speeding, drifting, shooting and blocking them with environmental hazards as you fight your way to first place. Play against your friends in intense four-player online multiplayer matches and aim for the top of the leaderboard.

name: Queer Man Peering Into A Rock Pool.jpg
description: A joyful, strange experience in which a middle-aged queer man toddles around an island attempting to re-furnish his empty house.

name: Omitted
description: Omitted is a first-person psychological horror game. Experience being left alone in an old hospital, discover its secrets and try to survive.

name: Miraculo Island
description: What you thought would be eight boring days in a remote island will become your worst nightmares. Is the place haunted? Is someone else out there to get us? Is there another motive they brought us here? Depends on you and your mates to survive in this mysterious place.

name: Moonhaven
description: You awake on the beach of a haunted island, hungry and alone. Farm, fish, hunt and gather to survive the harsh winters. Help rebuild the town of Moonhaven! Build a home and life for yourself in this survival life sim game.

name: Wizard time!
description: It's ”Wizard time!” – hardcore platformer with puzzle elements. Use different spell books and your skills to complete levels!

name: Skullborn
description: Skullborn is an infinite massively multiplayer sandbox game! Begin as a skeleton, fight, gather resources, and craft armor/weapon to upgrade your bones! Explore and team up with other players around the world.

name: Robin Hood: Spring of Life
description: As you overcome obstacles, gather resources and rebuild ravaged villages, you'll turn the pages of a fun and adventurous story packed with twists, turns and laughter!

name: Sand Castle
description: A date for a couple on the beach, a casual conversation, a bit of nostalgia and an important decision accompanying with a summer breeze.

name: Vampire Slayer: New Blood
description: Vampire Slayer: New Blood is a multiplayer first-person action shooter. Locations are varied and detailed, and each character comes with its own unique weapons and abilities. Pick a side, squad up, and master a rising roster of fearless characters in this fast-paced bloody FPS.

name: Fast Fruit
description: Panda is hungry - Get him his fruit! Collect the fruit as quickly as possible, and beat your time speedrun style. Run through various levels, get your best segments and beat your previously set times, possibly even setting a World Record!

name: End of this World
description: End of this world - You have nowhere to run, the end of the world came so quickly that it wiped out all people except you. It would seem that there are no problems and enemies? But now time will be your eternal rival ..

name: Rejoinder
description: Fight an army of skeletons and evil warriors! Collect coins to upgrade your gear! Defeat tough bosses in this roguelite with procedurally generated levels!

name: Entropic Decay
description: Entropic Decay is a lovingly crafted linear first person shooter driven by narrative, puzzles, combat arenas, and horror sequences. Think the atmosphere of a slow-burn horror inspired walking simulator, fused with the movement and combat options of a shooter...

name: Phantom Project
description: Phantom Project is a psychological horror game that encourages you to put your deerstalker on and unravel the supernatural mysteries around you. This game is a prototype and is subject to major changes and improvements.

name: Star of the Show
description: An interactive game show has surfaced on the web and you're the STAR OF THE SHOW! Investigate and even compete in the show! Be prepared, this show is life and death. Star Of The Show is a home invasion psychological horror game.

name: Seedlings
description: Immerse yourself in nature as a sentient seed in this relaxing award-winning 2.5D puzzle platformer. Possess different plant creatures with unique abilities and find your way through the New Zealand native forest, made using real photos and videos.

name: Hook 2
description: Relaxing puzzles. This time with extra dimension.

name: Pinball Groupies
description: You are a world champion Pinball Wizard, at the top of your game, and the fans love a winner... in this case I mean they really LOVE a winner! Play through 8+ different challenging levels of hot pinball action and excitement! The higher you score, the friendlier the fans get! It's time to score!

name: Dragon Ninja Byoka
description: Dragon Ninja Byoka is a retro, Indie Game platformer akin to the classic 1980s action platformers found on classic consoles, upgraded with bloody combat and pixel-perfect platforming action.

name: Chair Spinning Simulator
description: Chair Spinning Simulator is a short quirky game where you have to spin a chair as fast as possible to reach space in under 60 seconds!

name: 69 Mary Love
description: 69 Mary Love - is a game that contains novel and puzzle elements. You ordered a pizza from delivery service 69, but the courier girl was a few hours late. Looks like Mary will have to do something so that you don't write a complaint.

name: Cybertruck Sim
description: Cybertruck Simulator is all about the true reason the vehicle exists, with the most unrealistically accurate physics possible, the goal here is to simply have fun.

name: Zagamihara
description: Zagamihara puts you in the shoes of Saeko Satō, a senior Student at Sagamihara High School. After the outbreak of a deadly virus that turns people into mindless zombies, you find your self indebted to the fox spirit of a local shrine.

name: Puputan Legend VR
description: Puputan Legend VR Patih Kebo Iwa - is a custom multiplayer online battle arena game. Inspired by the history of the archipelago, this game has a puputan war theme with the icon Patih Kebo Iwa, the hero from Bali.

name: Last Threshold
description: Dive into the world based on the Lovecraft universe and its successors. In immersive visual novel discover the secret of the temple and learn the truth about your companions and your father’s past!

name: Toziuha Night: Dracula's Revenge
description: Follow the story of Xandria, the iron alchemist. Seeking revenge, she accepts the dangerous mission to put an end to the evil that resides in Dracula's castle and torments the people of Transylvania. Fight with an iron whip in this retro-style & Classic-Vania adventure.

name: Akuma: Cyberpunk Rhythm Action
description: Discover the dark side of the futuristic tech city, where the virtual has merged with the real. Surpass the other hackers of the city. Witness musical gameplay entwine with a fascinating story of fame, success, and the price you have to pay for it.

name: Where is He
description: Where is He Is a Simple Psychological Indie Horror Game, Where the player Unravel the mystery Of WHO IS HE And What is your Objective.

name: Stay with Me!: An Alien Abduction Story
description: Psychological horror game with a first person view, you will play a young woman who has lost her way and who apparently has been kidnapped by beings that are not from this world

name: Meister2
description: Craft and upgrade your gear to give your units a role. Units can continue to switch roles, depending on their equipment: Tanker, DPS, Healer, Worker, etc. Craft the most appropriate equipment to counteract the monsters who have gone crazy due to the unstable mana stream from destroying the village.

name: Bewildered
description: Bewildered is a Platforming-Adventure game where you form a friendship with a peculiar monster as you go about solving a mystery of what brought upon the endless night to the mysterious island. Learn to trust and help each other face obstacles and fears, as you make it through a vibrant world.

name: Insect Simulator
description: Choose an insect, develop a colony, join the fray!

name: Oh Boy More Cheese
description: Oh boy more cheesy fun with 4 different modes find your way through the mazes and hope to escape before your opponent play with cats on or off or maybe find the cheese and unlock the doors or do it all whatever you choose it will be cheesy fun

name: The Savior From Above
description: A sidescrolling 3D adventure shortgame combining multiple genres and featuring various action and puzzle sequences. Its artistic approach is supported by powerful visuals, intense atmosphere and a unique game narrative on the boundaries of science-fiction and fantasy.

name: Wicked Paradise
description: Wicked Paradise is a point and click visual novel, with mysterious and naughty story.

name: Village the Siberia
description: Uncover the terrible secret of Siberia as a little boy in the first person.

name: Transformation Tycoon
description: Run a small clinic that performs transformations for clients. Research new transformation techniques. Hire staff and fulfill their dreams by granting them their own transformation. Upgrade your clinic and gain fame (or infamy!) from your actions. Become the ultimate TRANSFORMATION TYCOON!

name: Catacombs of the Yokai
description: Catacombs of the Yokai is an indie single player psychological survival horror game in which you must explore the twisted depths of randomly generated catacombs filled with enemies inspired by Japanese/Taiwanese urban legends and myths.

name: Diner Together
description: Diner Together VR is a multiplayer co-op diner management simulator!

name: TealGrounds
description: TealGrounds is a third-person, puzzle, horror game with randomly generated world that takes place in an underground workshop of a scientist known as Dr Willis. Your goal is to solve puzzles, avoid aggressive machines and find the exit.

name: Would You Like to Run an Idol Café? 3
description: After their first music video goes viral, the girls of Sweet Shoreline, plus Naoya, are invited to a competition in Tokyo, where they can prove their worth against numerous famous idol groups. Will Sweet Shoreline prevail, or will their first big concert end in disaster?

name: Dead Tunnel
description: Dead Tunnel is 2D Shooter Platformer Roguelite game.

name: Out of Orbit
description: Design, build and manage your very own spacecraft. Explore unlimited amounts of randomly generated universes, travel through wormholes, do missions, survive cosmic events, collect and trade materials, win epic bossfights and many, many more things to do. The sky is the limit. Literally.

name: Neighbors
description: Know your neighbors. Find the truth. Betray them. Experience the nightmare of the Salem Witch Trials in this horror story based on true events.

name: Slit Mouthed
description: Slit Mouthed is a first-person horror adventure game based on a Japanese myth. The gameplay focuses on storytelling, stealth and decision making, there are also some puzzles for the player to solve, making gameplay more various.

name: Praecantor Lila: Bell Spell
description: A fast-paced magical bullet hell adventure! With an arsenal of versatile magical attacks at your disposal, dodge and shoot your way through six tightly-choreographed stages with the help of a mysterious, magic-sealing bell.

name: Annie and the Art Gallery
description: After months of waiting, Annie finally snags a ticket to the new art exhibit. However, things take a turn for the worst: she finds herself trapped in the museum's haunted basement. Help her navigate puzzles, traps, and more as she tries to escape - and find out the truth of what's really going on.

name: Land of Foot
description: Play together in this local co-op party where the shoes are in control! Guaranteed boots, battles, and bosses in your hunt for the evil Pegleg.

name: Princess Maira: Initiation
description: First instalment in the series of 2D action side-scrollers, taking place in very distant galaxy and not so distant future. Gameplay main hallmarks are fast-paced laser guns shootouts, punch 'n' kick combats, managing obby-like obstacles, using wits in overcoming deadly traps and witty dialogues.

name: Decimal
description: PROJECT TARS is a fast-paced 1st person parkour shooter in space. Experiment with gravity aboard a stranded spaceship. Play a protagonist who has to rebuild his memories of what happened and who he is.

name: Lady Hunt
description: Lady Hunt is a pixel art action platformer, set in a dark gothic world, where blood has been infected. You play as a huntress, who must find a way to purify this world, inhabited by monsters and beasts.

name: Trials of Proelium
description: Experience a colorful world full of vibrant characters through the eyes of Letha, a young warrior on the hunt for district masters in her pursuit to become Proeliums new emperor in this anime style turn-based RPG.

name: The Last Days of Sodom
description: Play as a Fallen Angel fighting a host of Enemies through the burning streets of Sodom, the Underworld and Third City of Hell. An exciting third-person shooter where the player will have to use intelligence as well as the trigger finger. Multiple different types of enemies. Original soundtrack.

name: Dungeon 100
description: A diablo game that does not need to brush equipment and only focuses on skill sets.

name: Sengoku Dynasty
description: Build and manage villages in an open-world feudal Japan. Survive, explore, meet unique characters, and establish your legacy. Play solo or in co-op multiplayer.

name: Station 35
description: Station 35 Is a single-player horror game, where the protagonist is the only human left in a space station where an unknown mutated alien escaped. His only chance of survival is to find a way to a space shuttle and escape the station without getting caught by the monster.

name: Monster Dungeon
description: 《Monster Dungeon》is a pixel Roguelike game, You can collect resources or materials in the game to craft equipment,tools,items, or enter the monster dungeon to challenge powerful monsters.

name: The Knight of Turn
description: Knight of Turn is a board game where the brave knight, imprisoned by the monsters in the deep dungeon, must find freedom and free the kingdom from this threat.

name: Rockstar Life
description: Rockstar Life is a casual life simulation game. In this game you get to write songs, organize tours, record singles and albums while you deal with the everyday drama of a wannabe Rockstar through random events.

name: Dreadful Wake
description: Dreadful Wake is an intense cooperative first-person shooter. Diverse level design governed by procedural generation. Punishing roguelike-style gameplay, trapped within ever-changing mazes.

name: Chefy-Chef
description: Once again approaching the refrigerator, Chefy magically finds himself in new worlds in which he has to find the ingredients for his favorite dish!

name: Fast Delivery
description: Fast Delivery is a fun and challenging runner about a food deliverer.

name: PixGirls
description: The objective is quite simple - each level contains numerous uncolored pixels and it is your job to color them in.

name: Adventure Rush
description: Get ready for another incredible adventure, face spiders, monsters and goblins in a side scrolling system with Shoot 'Em Up elements and try out numerous equipment with your hero. But beware of the fearsome Dragon!!

name: Monster of Nyum
description: It is a light RPG that develops a character in a defense method every turn. Grow and overcome the ordeal to obtain the final goal, the Nyum- soul of the Boss-GuiYi.

name: Patient Zero
description: Patient Zero is a randomly generated twin-stick shooter game with great emphasis on its roguelike elements. it takes its inspiration from 80s sci-fi and action movies. You play as one of the hazmat crew enlisted in a top-secret adventure to find Patient Zero and stop another deadly virus.

name: Dark Siege: The First Knight
description: The power of a god is within you in this single player action RPG.

name: Battle Crate Simulator
description: Outfit your crates for battle, explore an open world or watch them fight in sandbox mode!

name: Phoenix Hope
description: Phoenix Hope is a pixel art 2D real-time, side-view strategy game in which you must develop your colony during the day and repel waves of monsters at night.

name: Great Houses of Calderia
description: Great Houses of Calderia is a Feudal Grand Strategy game focusing on family dynamics & stories. Use your family strengths to compete against rivals to rise in the ranks of Calderia - produce, trade, scheme, bribe, and battle to build your legacy of power!

name: Beyond Dreams
description: Here is the work of a UE4 individual independent game developer. In this pixel game with simple plot, you will face 21 carefully designed bosses (two of them are plot characters), 16 magical treasures, difficult battles and challenge modes that bring new experience!!!

name: The Apollo Project
description: In The Apollo Project, you must survive against men and nature itself before it's too late. Harness the power of an alien artifact to infiltrate a top secret research facility to save the world from impending climate disaster. Can you make it out alive before it's too late?

name: Hum
description: Hum is a dark 2D adventure game with stealth and horror elements set in the bleak, retro-futuristic world of Postapoland. You discover that you cannot die, forever trapped in a nightmarish reality. Explore the world in ever shifting perspectives, reach the reality engine and finally die.

name: Elta 7
description: In the future world, in order to resist the oppression of Skynet, the underground resistance army sent the intelligent flight aircraft elta 7 to obtain the energy chip and control the energy source to destroy Skynet and make the world free again. We are indie game studio, enjoy it.

name: Beast Whalers
description: Beast Whalers is a naval roguelike about maneuvering against the wind and managing magical cannons. Explore wild archipelagos and fight against bizarre creatures like mortarfish and flying sharks to find the source of the sudden influx of Corruption.

name: 69 Moriko Love
description: 69 Moriko Love is a simple puzzle game. Collect the picture and open the animation with a reward. A great way to have a good time.

name: Demon King
description: Demon King is a multiplayer king-of-the-hill game where you become a powerful demon. Devour other demons to grow, evolve and become the King of hell.

name: Dead End Aegis: Gaiden
description: A squad of magical girls are the Earth's only defense against an alien invasion.

name: Resistance: The 8th Wave
description: A high-degree-of-freedom strategy FPS shooting game that incorporates Rougelike gameplay. It allows users to pay more attention to the elements of strategy selection while shooting refreshingly, and to grow and learn in the process of continuous challenges and pressure.

name: Kungen
description: In an silent bamboo environment, Kungen is a challenging sword combat game with short levels, can be played up to 4 players locally with controllers. Paint main characters and fight against the ninjas. The combat system is based on physics.

name: Kitty Cat Squash
description: Kitty Cat Squash is a super-casual and relaxing tile merge game! Use your paws to slide the adorable cats across the board and merge the cat tiles; when merged, a new cat appears. You will get hooked attempting to beat your highscore, and trying to discover all 16 cats!

name: Campground Owner
description: Become a campground owner. Manage your camping, have guests, count money.

name: Succubus Runa and the Erotic Dungeon
description: Turn based RPG with simple yet deep battles Battles, job changes, changes in battle status, original pixel art, and regular attacks. The final piece to the dungeon series.

name: Turnament
description: Turnament is a sci-fi strategy game in which you collect crystals to gain energy, and turn squares to destroy enemy drones.

name: Eason
description: Eason is a first-person horror game focusing on exploration of mysterious space. Players will be able to take control of Eason who has to find his true inner self and the answers....

name: Tails & Titties: Hot Spring
description: After shutting down a shady company hell bent on chopping down a forest, the local spirits and monster girls repay you with an unforgettable hot spring experience! (it's unforgettable because you have sex, ok?)

name: Spell Crisis
description: Shoot your spells as a little witch in this Mega Man-like action platformer with more exploration elements. Unleash new magic powers, discover new paths, and find rare and hidden items according to your decisions in the game.

name: Christmas Celebration With Sakuya Izayoi
description: Celebrate Christmas with Sakuya Izayoi from the Touhou Project in this cozy visual novel! Explore the colourful sights of the human village in Gensokyo as it hosts a one of a kind festival with several venues and gorgeous sights to see!

name: Headpunk: The Comic-Style Battle Chaos
description: Headpunk is a 3D comic-style player vs. player (PvP) deathmatch game. In the game, everyone is the enemy except you. Either shoot enemy players with the Pump Gun or blow their heads with the Rocket Launcher.

name: Mothered
description: An immersive first-person horror adventure where you play the role of LIANA - a young girl who arrives home after major surgery and is met with a strange mannequin claiming to be her mother.

name: Auction
description: Auction is a 4 player co-op horror game where you must escape a mysterious building by finding keys left around. Solve puzzles, find keys and avoid the guards to reach the exit gate and break out...

name: Shred and Tear: Explosive Kajun
description: An ultraviolent, fast-paced, sexy and gory Hack n' Slash Single player game giving you heavy doses Adrenaline-rush with eye-candy fan service QTE and mecha-waifu.

name: SteelPinion
description: SteelPinion is a steampunk turn based tactical strategy game with a dash of autobattler. Experience a conspiratorial retelling of history where steampunkery, chivalry, & explosive elemental weaponry prevails. Combat is a mix of well known tactics game genre staples.

name: Forest Mystery
description: Forest Mystery is a casual walking simulator where you do some quest on the way to find who did it.

name: All to Race
description: Participate in the craziest races organized by a multi-million dollar company that has decided that everyone can participate regardless of the vehicle you compete with, all to race!

name: Endragon
description: ENDRAGON is an action RPG in which Mars, a former hero, and Luna, a modern sorceress, travel together to defeat a great evil that has risen from the dead.

name: Bounty Below
description: Bounty below is an idle adventure game about mining and smithing items. While your units are mining for you delve into the endless dungeon to gain even more ore!

name: Albert and Camille's Little Lille Adventure
description: Explore a war-torn city, avoid capture by soldiers, and collect the supplies Albert and Camille need to create the first vaccine to fight tuberculosis. As you progress, you will learn about the methods used to create BCG and how vaccines work.

name: They Сame From Above
description: They Came From Above is a cute Tower Defense in Lowpoly 3D graphics. Here you have to build an economy and various defense towers to resist hordes of aliens.

name: Eternal Night
description: This is a thriller survival horror game. You will play the role of a dark past, uncovering the secrets buried in the hospital, the tragedy of the family, and the madness of human nature.

name: Inverse Evolver
description: Inverse Evolver is a side-scrolling action that combines roguelike mechanics. Explore different dungeons; use diverse items to form powerful combos, and beat ferocious beasts and bosses.

name: Hidden Water
description: Find the objects that are hidden on the map.

name: Casino Resort Tower
description: Casino Resort Tower is a simulation game where you build and manage a casino hotel skyscraper from the ground up. While trying to solve the problems caused by troublesome customers with a CEO that dreams about a luxury office.

name: Hell Weaver
description: A small team of paranormal investigators get a tip to search a rumored mansion with a dark history. A hand-drawn action-adventure survival horror game through a eerie mansion filled with disturbing creatures and monstrosities, listening closely will be your guide, light is your key to survival.

name: All Quiet Roads 4743
description: A clean and simple city road builder where busy roads turn red. Your job is to add roads that may prevent waiting vehicles from overflowing your neighborhoods.

name: ChickenZ
description: ChickenZ is an arena shooter where you have to fight in a post-apocalyptic location against crowds of angry zombies that will try to eat you.

name: CrazyParty
description: It is a game where you move in a wide map in all directions using 12 cards of your choice, and play against or cooperate with other players to play mini games.

name: The Happy Dismal Town
description: A funny and dramatic game telling the story of a detective. NOIR themed with a cyberpunk background with elements of Lovecraftian horror story.

name: After the first station
description: After the first station is to create a chill and relaxing landscape for the players to explore. It includes light puzzles and fantasy elements. Let’s embark on a journey into the uncharted realm. 🚂 • • • • • • • •

name: Rove: The Wanderer's Tale
description: ROVE is a 'point-n-slash' adventure that blends intense isometric Action RPG gameplay with the charm and puzzles of point-and-click exploration. Dive into a handcrafted world full of fierce enemies and quirky characters, where every choice and combat encounter drives the narrative forward.

name: Intralism: Rebuild
description:
Intralism: Rebuild - fast and hard rhythm game. Listen to music and match arcs to the beat. Master all beatmaps or create your own and challenge friends with online multiplayer. But remember: wrong button - failed try.

This is a rebuild-remake of the original Intralism. It's main idea is to fix all the remaining issues of original game. The main focus of development was on the maps editor and global ranking. Players are able to easily add their favorite music into the game and play it with friends.

name: A Frail Qubit
description: In a dark, expansive, and unforgiving world, you are a frail Quantum Bit (Qubit) completing mysterious Trials. Explore and conquer your world, inquire about the nature of the Trials, and hatch a plan to escape.

name: The Humbling of a Holy Maiden
description: The Tree of Life is dead and withered, and the kingdom's Holy Maiden longs to be disgraced. You have come from another world to teach her what it means to love. Witness the Holy Maiden's transformation as she descends into sweet corruption!

name: Deranged
description: Deranged is a single player puzzle and psychological horror video game. Find a way to escape the O'Connor mansion before things get tough. Remember that in order to escape you must complete challenging puzzles against the clock ... Will you be able?

name: Pill Baby
description: A stylish hack and slash game about an immigrant who takes drugs for her job. Play as Anna, finding a job and moving to a new country. Explore her new life, struggles, loneliness, relationships, language barrier.

name: MeetCute
description: ​Meet-cute (n) - An amusing or charming first encounter that leads to the development of a romantic relationship

name: Introvert: Consequences
description: Four high school shooting survivors move to a new city and attend a 5-day group therapy program. Discover the secrets, situations, and people that await you in this surreal universe while trying to deal with the guilt and grief caused by the disturbing unforgettable past.

name: Platonic
description: Platonic is a first-person puzzle adventure game. Explore five unique worlds. Solve logical challenges. Gather clues and think outside the cube.

name: Beat Invaders
description: Beat Invaders is a cool space Shoot-Em-Up. Blast your way through enemy fleets! Upgrade your ship with rockets & armor! Defeat the final boss! All to flashy neon musically charged visuals!

name: Jericho Dungeon
description: 4 (and more) souls were lost in the dungeon, and the only clue was to follow the instructions to collect ancient coins. Every hero has unique advantages, choosing a character that suits your own style. Or, Avoid undead monsters in a dark and narrow space station, no chance of respawn.

name: Burnhouse Lane
description: Burnhouse Lane tells a story of Angie Weather, a one foot in the grave agency nurse attempting to complete five impossible tasks in order to win her life back. Solve puzzles, make friends and enemies, run, hide and fight in this dark adventure that'll take you on a trip to another world and back...

name: Planet Boom
description: This chaotic fast-paced planetary defense game will have you shoot, jump, dash, and teleport across a fully destructible planet to fend off enemies flying in from all directions. Switch between multiple unique turrets, upgraded to suit your play style, for eye-popping synergetic plays!

name: Didnapper 2
description: Didnapper 2 is a story-focused JRPG adventure featuring lots, lots of DiD (damsel in distress) scenes! Play as the magically-gifted hero Seles and try to avoid capture or escape your bonds, as she tries to uncover the secrets of the world with a party of misfits.

name: Cursed Town
description: Cursed Town is a game about the story of an old abandoned town, from the Medievo to Classic times this place has been used for many purposes.

name: Emi & The Super Boba
description: Get your game on as Emi jetpacks through a treacherous crystal cave and blasts her way to the top.

name: Mugen Journey
description: Accompany your mecha ally in this wild platform game. Dodge the crazy storms to survive and manage to capture all the shards through your path to victory.

name: Vnesis
description: Vnesis is a game inspired by the eighties, a 2D perspective game in a 3D environment. There are more than 16 challenging levels to explore. The combination of action and responsiveness in the game of continuous excitement makes it unique and entertaining.

name: Battle Tops
description: Battle Tops is a game where you can design and battle your own battle tops. Or battle them against random tops. There are also lots of customizable options and arenas so you can customize every battle. You can also play with your Twitch viewers.

name: Stopocop
description: STOPOCOP - Top Down game where the player runs around the level and blocks with a shield, must reflect enemy bullets and direct them in the direction where the enemies are in order to destroy them, but without touching civilians.

name: My University Girlfriend
description: This is a relaxing and casual puzzle game that can train your memory and observation skills. The after-school life in Angel Academy is always so colorful, and the graceful and colorful figures in the club are full of youth and vitality. Here, what kind of beautiful encounter will be waiting for you?

name: Grocket
description: Grocket is a minimalist, precision-based adventure and puzzle game. To survive in space, you not only have to escape numerous dangers, but also prove your skills at playing with and against other players.

name: Paper Enchantress
description: Paper Enchantress - это романтическое приключение полное магии, судьбоносных решений и прекрасных принцев. Что откроется за таинственной дверью?

name: Jammo
description: JAMMO is a MMORPG dungeon crawler game where the goal is to grind dungeons to find loot, upgrade your items, and dominate during the Guild War event. May the strong put up a fight, but the strongest take home the title.

name: Alien Accident
description: Alien Accident is a top-down race, a flying saucer and oncoming traffic. It is necessary to collect people for fuel. Do not accelerate too much, fuel runs out much faster. Use trampolines when flying over cars. Your people believe in you!

name: Shinobi Shift
description: Shinobi Shift is a first-person platformer with shooter elements where you can control the time!

name: Star Knightess Aura
description: Follow Aura's adventure as she is thrust into the fantasy world of Roya. What she initially believed to follow the conventional plotline of a "summoned to another world"-story quickly turns into her worst nightmare.

name: Outlandia
description: As a wandering outland wizard (Maegis), you've inadvertently inherited the protection of a small medieval town - Skala Village. Will you be able to develop your skills sufficiently to fend off a growing evil presence, while keeping yourself alive to enjoy the surrounding lush environment?

name: Assembly
description: Construct animals from pieces in new 3D puzzle game.

name: Fuckling
description: Berk is a wild but genius professional wrestler. He always wins by looking for gaps and using his techniques! Anything goes in the world of underground wrestling. The audience want to see the policewoman being recklessly violated. Make her surrender using shameful dirty skills!

name: Mondrian Squares
description: Mondrian Squares is a colourful, abstract puzzle game with random, procedurally generated levels so you never play the same game twice. Progressive difficulty with no upper limit ensures that you will always have a new challenge to face.

name: Do Something
description: After a few hours of epidemic, you go straight to the center to find a secret descent to the laboratory and destroy the virus...

name: Castle in the Sky: Clash of Sky Palace
description: Uncompromising survival & Fantasy World Exploration: You play as Rain, a martial artist who enter a fantasy and unxplored world full of flying rocks, gemstones and surprises. combat with troops that match your survival style. Fight your way out as you unravel the mysteries of this flying island.

name: Apocalyptic Slant
description: You are the chosen one to save the world once and for all. Explore the world in this classic FPS shooter game full of bloody zombies, poisonous spiders, and strange-looking creatures. Hopeful citizens are willing to give you everything they have in order to help them survive the apocalypse.

name: MonoRaceVR
description: MonoRaceVR is a monobike racing in Virtual Reality with unique controls

name: Immortal Tactics: War of the Eternals
description: Experience a Fast-Paced Roguelite Turn-Based Strategy game with a New Turn-Based Engine which will need you to plan early on and create strategies that would lead your army to victory. Create an army with different Characters and Leaders to choose from and explore this Roguelite world.

name: Alien Worm
description: Welcome to an incredibly atmospheric game in which you have to control an alien underground worm and kill everything that moves!

name: Drakula
description: DRAKULA is an action-platformer with puzzle elements where you play as Van Helsing. Use your wooden stakes to climb obstacles and kill enemies on your war.

name: Nia
description: For over a century, a kilometer high crust of ice has covered the earth sealing in and preserving the lost surface world…... Icepunk prospectors scour the frozen tundra, tunneling through the frosty depths to caverns of former cities and malls rich in resources of the before time…..

name: PenBall
description: There is a ball on a small field with a top view. Your gate is at the bottom, and your opponent's gate is at the top. Your goal is to score the ball into the opponent's goal.

name: Blade of Si
description: Immerse yourself in this action platformer as you run, jump, slash beasts, solve puzzles, avoid deadly traps, and find hidden treasures in this fairy-tale fantasy world. Take the role of a young girl who finds herself tasked with the burden of saving her realm from evil.

name: Battle of the Robots
description: Battle Of The Robots is a spectacular fighting game featuring robots. In this game you will find the most beautiful battles and fights in which you have to fight with robots. Engage in intense close combat and become the king of the martial arts! Defeat them all and stand on the podium of the winner

name: Shrine of Tails
description: You ended up in an ancient shrine and now you have to figure out what is going on here. Meet the girls living here and show them the power of your "artifact".

name: Animals Fight
description: Animals Fight is an entertaining fighting game. In this game you will find beautiful battles and duels in which you can fight with animals. Engage in intense melee combat in Animals Fight and become the king of the martial arts!

name: Bikini Tits
description: So begins a young man's poolside seduction by two very married ladies! Will he finally get the summer break he's been hoping for?!

name: CoWorker
description: Local co-op tower defense game set in a factory with zombies.

name: Sports Betting Simulator
description: This is a sports betting simulation game. You have to make bets and earn money in order to achieve set goals and advance in your adventure.

name: Artificial Entanglement
description: Uncover the mysteries of your existence in an abandoned robotics lab, using precision platforming, magnetism, puzzle solving & death. *hacking sounds* ₲łVɆ ₥Ɇ ₳ ₵Ⱨ₳₦₵Ɇ *hacking sounds*

name: TimeLock VR 2
description: TimeLock VR 2 - the player must free the soul of the ancestor, imprisoned by the sorcerer in stone. To travel in timeyou will need to create spells. Time travel will take place in different eras of the past.

name: Druid: Test of faith
description: Make a move on a fascinating journey through the fantasy world, where interesting encounters and amazing stories await you. This wonderful world is waiting for its hero. Will you have the strength to save him? Or will it all come to an end? It all depends on you!

name: Run, Kitty!
description: A cute little romantic story about rescue and love. Once upon a cat named Simon, decided to skip classes to wander. Before he knew it, he got lost in the deep forest – chased by an unknown predator. Will he be able to get out by his own means?

name: Starbase Gunship
description: Starbase Gunship places you in the seat of a weapons officer on a state-of-the-art Gunship as you defend a remote outpost from an Alien invasion fleet. With access to laser cannons, missiles, miniguns and nuclear warheads, you are the last line of defense between humanity and the alien invaders.

name: Lectro
description: Can you help Lectro escape the scientists who have held him captive in ZYER Labs? Help Lectro traverse through unique and exhilarating challenges in vast, beautiful environments to gain his freedom.

name: NeverAwake
description: A girl who never wakes up. She has been fighting monsters in her dreams... "NeverAwake" is a nightmarish twin-stick shooter with a unique worldview and original game rules.

name: Nightmare
description: The courier, Lympha, tells her; "If you were to defeat the boss, Malignant Tumor, in this world, you shall return to your own world." Julia strives with an Anticancer Drug held in her arms. Believing that, the flower blooming at the nidus, is glimmering in Nightmare...

name: Pride and Prejudice: Blood Ties
description: What is going on at Rosings Park!? When your sister Lydia goes missing and Mr Darcy forbids you to come see him at Rosings Park, that is EXACTLY where you are going!

name: Fossilfuel VR: Raptor Isolation
description: Go up against nature's greatest predator in VR! No guns, just you and a Utah Raptor, trapped underground in this intense horror companion to the dino shooter, Fossilfuel.

name: Immortal Love: True Treasure - Collector's Edition
description: Not all that glitters is gold...

name: TagHunter
description: TagHunter is Super Cool Adventure with Power and Treasure.

name: Breadskate
description: BRDSKT (BREADSKATE) is a freeroam skating game but you play as bread and ducks with guns have invaded your world. Simply give your newly baken bread loafs some wheels and watch them go skating and exploring the world. Truly the miracle of life of bread!

name: Coral Drive
description: Coral Drive is a "SF factory labor simulation" set in the future. Here, you work on ship manufacturing and save money to get out of platform workers.

name: Shirone: the Dragon Girl
description: ”Shirone: the Dragon Girl" is a 3D adventure game where you help Shirone solve puzzles and riddles to find a way out of a haunted castle. Escaping the castle is the main objective, and to do that you'll need to make full use of her wings and tail!

name: Tear of Time: Lost Memory
description: Is an adventure game. You play as a character who, waking up in a house on a remote island, realizes that she has lost her memory. Player will have to find out the reason for the loss of memory, explore the island, find ancient treasures, explore the ruins with secret locations and solve puzzles.

name: Dungeon Raider
description: Endless Hack'n Slash Dungeon Crawler Runner with RPG and Adventure elements awaits in this critically acclaimed by us incredible breakthrough of immense proportions for the gaming industry and peace on earth, title.

name: Spectrum
description: A beautiful puzzle game

name: Agni
description: Agni is a runner game, help a mysterious cat to collect fragments through different landscapes and enjoy an endless mode for scoring!

name: Lofi Hollow
description: A moddable ASCII semi-casual life simulator with permadeath options and multiplayer.

name: Got Reincarnated into a World of RPG Full of NPCs...
description: The main character dies in the real world and gets reincarnated as "Mobuo" in a fantasy world of swords and magic. However, the world only contained NPCs... And when he finds out he can do anything to them...

name: One Line: Letters and Codes
description: You have just received a coded love letter! In this minimalist puzzle, you will have to draw a single line to fill the entire board. At each level solved, get a code to reveal a piece of the letter. Gather the codes, read the letter and discover the message.

name: I am not legend
description: A killing time zombie game, the goal is simple, but it is a little difficult and needs some luck. Kill all zombies in the scene, but they double the remaining number every 10 minutes. Do you kill zombies first or find items first? Skill, strategy and luck are important. Can you accept the challenge?

name: Oli
description: Oli is a short 2D puzzle-platformer game, with a thriller atmosphere. In this game you play as a child who needs to escape from scary monsters while passing through different locations in an inhospitable city. This project is inspired by others games like Limbo and Little Nightmares.

name: BeatNClean
description: Our goal is to move forward in the subway we are in before any of our Life or Cleaning bars comes to an end. Depending on the situation, you can collect the garbage in the subway so that your cleaning bar does not fall or you can beat the gang members who cross your path in the subway.

name: Trialtime Reborn
description: Trialtime Reborn is a challenging trial moto simulation with a simple goal, going to the end without falling down ! 20 levels are available in the game, but you'll have to earn stars thanks to your skills and control in the first levels to access the next ones with increasing difficulty.

name: Any World
description: Any World is a game that tells about the adventure of an alien who was forced to go to the planet Emria and explore it. Emria is not a simple planet. It is inhabited by various creatures, both friendly and hostile. Our hero will meet everyone.

name: MeteoHeroes
description: If you like platform and adventure games, get ready to enjoy MeteoHeroes, a game full of action and fun, fight for a clean and safe planet and take your superheroes to their final destination where they will have to face the fearsome Doctor Makina and the Maculans.

name: Grimace Run
description: Grimace Run is a fun free to play endless runner game based on the Grimace Coin Meme Token. Collect as many Grimace coins as you can and get some cool skins! Try to climb the leaderboard to show everyone who the boss is! Are you ready for the challenge?

name: Lost Sunday Comics
description: Lost Sunday Comics is a virtual comic book library where you can enjoy in discreet, magical settings original, new and exciting works of art from carefully selected comic book artists.

name: Black Magic Gamebox
description: The Black Magic Gamebox is a collection of games featuring The Arcade game: They Came From Earth...Again, the FPS, RPG: The Lightbringer, The RPG Party Game: Mages and Monsters, and the Multiplayer Dice game: Dungeon Dice Monsters.

name: Find a way out: Abode of darkness.
description: A game in the genre: First Person Shooter, RPG, Puzzle. You'll have to walk around the building to get essential items. Also you have to save battery charge because it runs out very fast. And the worst thing you'll face with is contaminated which is far more dangerous than zombies!

name: Natalia
description: Natalia lived a free-spirited life while running a shop for everything. One day under Natalia, a strange work comes in. It was to hire a maid exclusively for the second prince Creto from the common people. Can Natalia do this work involving the royal family properly? Visual novel.

name: Queenchantment
description: The Lich Queen needs your help to achieve her ultimate goal. Ready your troops and set your traps to hold the incoming kingdom soldiers and their allies in a 2D tower defense game!

name: Diner Runners
description: Run Your Fast Food Diner solo or grab your friends and play together , Server customers , Upgrade Your shop , Restock and Run The Diner !

name: The Dark Journey
description: The Dark Journey is a multiple ending hardcore survival horror game telling a story of a group of people who lost their way in the sea , ending on a mysterious dark island where they have to survive and find their way out

name: Escape to School
description: Escape To School is an action game where you have to get into a school and get all requiered items to leave it. There is a tutorial where you will learn the mechanics of the gameplay. The final goal is to Escape the school in short time. You can try to beat your highscore every time you are playing.

name: Sinthetic
description: Step into the dystopia that is Vacancy City. In an open-world, action-RPG featuring a combination of elements from Western and Japanese RPGs. Join the ragtag squad of unlikely allies led by the veteran-turned-mercenary Fawke Harvey as they apprehend crime while they uncover a conspiracy.

name: Everblade
description: Avenge a crumbling world in this varied platformer. Jump, fight, climb, and fly through worlds full of hazards and puzzles. Discover hidden treasures and develop new skills and devastating attacks to aid in your fight against the hordes of evil. Will you succeed and restore order to the world?

name: Vereda
description: Vereda is a 3d escape room puzzle adventure. Play as a secret agent assigned a mission to recover a secret dossier set in an unusual town. Explore areas and take in your surroundings. Use all of your puzzle solving skills to make your way through the town and recover the missing dossier.

name: SworLd
description: SworLd is a VR Sci-Fi combat game based on physics. Create weapons of any shape and defeat your enemies.

name: Steel Shell
description: Steel Shell - This is a third-person shooter, in the style of dark cyberpunk. There is no linear plot, quests, and pumping. Just grab the first cannon you see and scrap those damn droids!

name: Magic Crystals
description: "Magic Crystals" is a fun tower defense game with very unique mechanics - during the game you need to move crystals to the best places for the best defense. Don't forget to upgrade your crystals because enemies are stronger with every new wave!

name: Astro Mission: Moon
description: Overcome all obstacles to cross the Moon. But watch your instincts.

name: G.E.T.
description: G.E.T. (Gather, Explore, Technologize) is a 3D first person open world adventure-survival game. On your journey you will progress through different ages, beginning from the stone age and finishing in the far future.

name: Zombies ate my dog
description: "Zombies ate my dog" is a classic 2D arena shooter game with tons of zombies! Zombies ate your dog so you are visiting every region in the region to kill every undead you can find.

name: A Second Before the War
description: When people destroyed themselves in WWIII, new war was started by.. animals... Lead one of the five sides and save (or conquer - your choice) the world in this simple turn-based strategy. How about a small fight?

name: You Are Not Bunnygirl
description: You Are NOT Bunnygirl is an RPG about self-care! Manage Physical and Emotional Health as you guide Bunnygirl through a lab of malfunctioning robots. You can't actually lose, because it's a game, but you should protect Bunnygirl anyways because she might not appreciate it if you don't.

name: Debt
description: Owen finds himself immersed in fear and tension, unaware that the adventure that began with the quest for cursed gold in the mine he entered because of his debt could end up ruining his life.

name: Helga the Viking Warrior
description: Can you help jung Viking Helga in this epic Match3 game to avenge her Familie that was killed by a fierce stranger? With your help and the help of the mighty warrior Ragnar Lodbrok himself, you can succeeed...

name: Infinadeck Medieval Maze
description: A twisty-turny castle maze designed to show off the strengths of the Infinadeck omnidirectional treadmill. Designed for both slow and fast walkers, this experience is fun for all ages when paired with a full virtual reality setup.

name: Hidden Western
description: Find the objects that are hidden on the map.

name: Vacuum Ball
description: You control a ball that attracts all kinds of cubes but try only to collect the white cubes to finish the levels.

name: Ghost Castle
description: Defeat the ghosts who live in the castle! Make full use of the ninja weapons and skills to aim for the top floor where the ghost boss Yamatanoorochi is! Weapons such as shurikens, bombs and swords, and skills such as fire and freeze will surely help. Keep the peace of the village!

name: The Asfrixa
description: Trapped in an installation made for "Asfrixa's", you'll have to go through your worst nightmares and puzzles to find your way out before being consumed by the shadows along with the place.

name: The World According to Girl
description: A deck-building roguelike caring game In a collapsed world, a plan to raise a young girl into a savior begins in order to find the only salvation. You become an "administrator" to raise a girl to become a savior, and raise her by selecting "human resources (cards)" with various effects.

name: New Century Galaxy Legend
description: New century Galaxy legend is a free to play barrage game where you avoid barrages from all directions and survive as long as possible. Players who have survived for a long time can gain higher ranking, so try your best to overcome this challenge and keep breaking records!

name: Dream Busters
description: Nostalgic and New style. A new sensation! Retro fantasy shooter

name: Zombodrive
description: Get in the car and go on a dangerous adventure in the post-apocalyptic world

name: SnOut 2
description: Compete for the top scores in this combination of two classic arcade games, or fight your friends to prove who has the longest SnOut!

name: Plentypede
description: Don't let Urcash and his troops get past the outpost. The peace and safety of mankind is in your hands

name: Haulin' Oats
description: Haulin' Oats is a board game about truck driving, the US highways, and oatmeal. Four players compete to deliver their cargo then return to the warehouse while avoiding various dangers along the way. Take part in sabotage, races, curses, and more to get the upper-hand.

name: OddFauna: Secret of the Terrabeast
description: Craft, forage & farm across a whimsical land with new friends in this open world sandbox adventure. What world will you create?

name: Blind Dreams
description: A game about a colorblind girl, stuck within a dreamlike, colorless world.

name: Blinky
description: You play as a small-eyed creature who needs to shoot bacteria falling on the island.

name: Islandville: A New Home
description: Set off on an exciting journey in search of new lands and untold treasures in a new time management game.

name: Tower of Ascension
description: Tower of Ascension is a roguelite tower defense game. Grow your build, solve levels in unique ways, and ascend the tower.

name: Ancient Islands
